title: Pacquiao: running for Senate to help people
text:
Pacquiao: running for Senate to help people 8:25pm BST - 00:44 
Filipino boxing great Manny Pacquiao says he's running for Senate in his native Philippines because he wants to help people. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
ROUGH CUT (NO REPORTER NARRATION) Filipino boxing great Manny Pacquiao, a winner of world titles in eight different weight categories, said his mission in politics remains focused on helping others. Pacquiao is already a member of the country's lower house of representatives and announced plans last week to run for a seat in the senate next year. "I'm running because I really believe that I can help more people and I'm getting ready to make a decision to run," Pacquiao said. Pacquiao made the comments during a reception at the Asia Society in New York where he was awarded the Asia Game Changer Award.
